Class SimpleBoardTest

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.board.SimpleBoardTest
@DisplayName("SimpleBoard Tests") class SimpleBoardTest extends Object
Test suite for SimpleBoard class. Tests brick movement, rotation, spawning, and row clearing operations.

    Description
    private static class 
    SimpleBoardTest.TestBrickGenerator
    Test brick generator that provides deterministic bricks for testing.

    • getCurrentOffset

      private Point getCurrentOffset(SimpleBoard board)
      Helper method to get current offset using reflection or ViewData. Since currentOffset is private, we use ViewData to infer position.
